person.name: Carlos A. Godoy
person.description: Elder Carlos A. Godoy was called to serve as a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 5, 2008, at age 47. At the time of his call, he had been serving as a member of the Seventh Quorum of the Seventy in the Brazil Area. He has served as a counselor in the South America West Area Presidency and is currently serving as a counselor in the Brazil Area Presidency.
